# decodeOptimizer(_:)

**Instance Method**

Decodes an optimizer value.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func decodeOptimizer<T>(_ value: T.Type) throws -> T where T : Decodable
```

## Discussion

Decoding an optimizer lets you resume fitting.

## Decoding values

- **decode(_:)**: Decodes a value.
